Resources

Class MemFIFO<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Resources.MemObject<R>
      • Resources.MemFIFO<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - data type of stored objects

    public class MemFIFO<R>
extends MemObject<R>
    Parametric FIFO derived from a parametric memory. Errors are reported.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean empty
      Signaling FIFO empty state.
      private int inPnt
      Pointer to the first empty location.
      private int numElem
      Number of element in the FIFO
      private int outPnt
      Pointer to the first occupied location.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MemFIFO

        public MemFIFO(R[] storage)
        throws MemException
        FIFO instantiation. The instantiation only takes place if the memory exists. Otherwise, an error is reported.
        Parameters:
        storage - memory to be used
        Throws:
        MemException - when the memory does not exist

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(R val)
           throws MemException
        FIFO insertion. A parametric object is written into it. If the FIFO is full, an error is reported.
        Specified by:
        write in class MemObject<R>
        Parameters:
        val - parametric object to be written
        Throws:
        MemException - when the FIFO is full

      • read

        public R read()
       throws MemException
        FIFO retrieval. A parametric object is read from it. If the FIFO is empty, an error is reported.
        Specified by:
        read in class MemObject<R>
        Returns:
        first parametric object that was written
        Throws:
        MemException - when the FIFO is empty

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Check if FIFO is empty
        Returns:
        true, if empty. False, otherwise.

      • peek

        public R peek()
       throws MemException
        Get FIFO peek element.
        Returns:
        element.
        Throws:
        MemException - when the fifo is empty.
